entry.title: Ukraine and Russia Resume Talks as Moscow's Bombing Campaign Grinds On
entry.content: The diplomatic efforts came after an attack on a Kyiv residential building that left two people dead and 12 wounded.

entry.title: Russians Kill Civilians, Loot for Supplies in Occupied Ukraine, Residents Say
entry.content: Locals described hungry and undisciplined Russian troops shooting civilians, breaking into supermarkets and shops, and raiding homes in search of food and valuables as their own supply lines have failed.
